item.description:
Dance at Whippersnappers

Saturday July 2nd. anytime after 7 pm.

Whippersnappers

rt 102 Londonderry Commans

Londonderry NH. 03053

http://www.whippersnappersnh.com

Cover charge $5. after 7ish

Dance to Grove Alliance

Host:Steve O. 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net

 

I am doing dinner and drinks at 6pm. Dance at 9:30pm..

        Join us for dinner or just for drinks at 6 pm. with no cover charge, or you can just get there anytime you can. But, the cover charge usually starts at 7. The Band doesn't start til 9:30. So, we will be having dinner or drinks at 6 and dancing to the Dj after that.

        We have danced to this Group many time before, and we danced all night. So come and get there early if you can. So Steve O. can introduce you to as many people as he can. Once the Band starts, everyone is on the dance floor. So, there is no one to introduce you too.
item.how_to_find_us: Look 4 the Meetup signs on our tables

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Dance at Whippersnappers
